scripts.build-babel: export NODE_ENV=production && rm -rf deployment/* && cp -r configuration ./deployment/configuration && cp -r webapp ./deployment/webapp && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/server/ ./server && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/configuration/ ./configuration && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/graphql/ ./graphql && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/scripts/ ./scripts && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/server/ ./server && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/units/ ./units && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/webapp/ ./webapp && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/server/ ./server && cp -r public ./deployment/public && cp ./package.json ./deployment && cp ./yarn.lock ./deployment
scripts.build-bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.map --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.build-bundle-android-dev: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.map --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.build-bundle-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ios/main.map
scripts.build-bundle-ios-dev: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev true --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ios/main.map
scripts.build-deployment: npm run build-schema && npm run build-webpack && npm run build-babel
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev-webpack" "npm run dev-server" "npm run start"
scripts.dev-reset: sudo chmod -R a+w * && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf ~/.node-gyp && rm -f ./ios/main.* && rm -f ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.*
scripts.dev-w: rmdir /s /q build & concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev-webpack-w" "npm run dev-server-w" "npm run start"
scripts.setup-local: cp ./configuration/default.env ./.env && cp ./configuration/app/default.publicURL.js ./configuration/app/publicURL.js && npm run update-ip && react-native link && (cd .git/hooks && ln -s -f ../../scripts/pre-commit.sh ./pre-commit)
scripts.setup-local-w: copy .\configuration\default.env .\.env. && copy .\configuration\app\default.publicURL.js configuration\app\publicURL.js && npm run update-ip && react-native link
